name: ORPG - Star World
description:
ORPG is a huge concept that allows players to play with multiple maps to increase the power of their hero.

This ORPG game tries to include all World of Warcraft user-friendly concepts... And the same systems.

## Blizzard Games Systems included

### Loot System

World of Warcraft Loot System.



### Quest System

World of Warcraft Quest System (using QL 1.2r).



### Trade System

World of Warcraft Trade System.



### Crafting

Original based system. A mixe between World of Warcraft and Lineage 2.

You can have a job. A job allows you to gather some gatherables (Animus ; Minerals ; Terrazine). If you want to create a special item, get the parchment for your object and gather all needed elements. Click upon the parchment item to create the item you would like.

### Party & Moderation

Accept an invite from a group to join this group. In a group, you are friendly with others players in this group. You can activate a "PvP Tag" to become hostile against all others players. If you are attacked, the source player activate this "PvP Tag" and become hostile against all others players - and you can kill him.

In a Dungeon Maps, you can ban a player from your party. If you ban a player in a Dungeon Map, the player is banned from the entire map and exist the map.

In normal maps, you can cancel the invite of a party member to disjoin this member from your party.

## Gameplay & Classes

### Classes

3 classes for 6 subclasses. Your hero can reach the 30th level. The subclass division is at levell 20.

### Gameplay

15 codex by class/subclass. Each codex learn you a skill. Your hero can only have 5 different skills. You can choise the shortcut for all of these skills. Codex have updated versions.

### Maps

All maps are divided into 3 parts:

- Dungeon Maps. All players are in the same party. 
- Arena Maps. All players not in group are hostile against all others players. 
- Normal Maps. All players not in group are neutral against all others players. Accept an invite from a group to join this group. In a group, you are friendly with others players in this group. You can activate a "PvP Tag" to become hostile against all others players. If you are attacked, the source player activate this "PvP Tag" and become hostile against all others players - and you can kill him.
